DUBLIN , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/z2shkv/global_malic_acid ) has announced the addition of the "Global Malic Acid Market 2015 - 2019" report to their offering. 
Global Malic Acid Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from various industry experts. The report includes a comprehensive discussion of the market, an extensive coverage on various types of production techniques, applications, and demand-supply dynamics in various geographies. The report provides comments on both the existing market landscape and its growth prospects over the forecast period. The report further includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. 
North American and European economies have recovered gradually from the 2008-2009 recession, and this has resulted in increased disposable incomes of consumers in these regions. In APAC, India , and China have also reported an increase in disposable incomes of consumers. APAC is expected to be the fastest growing market for malic acid during the forecast period, and increase in disposable income will fuel the adoption of the beverages, confectionaries, and FMCG products by end-users in these regions. 
According to the report, the food and beverage industry offers a diverse set of products such as fresh, frozen, and processed foods. The main factors contributing to the growth of the industry are the rise in demand for packaged food worldwide. Economic growth in countries such as India and China has resulted in an increase in the disposable incomes of consumers. Moreover, the establishment of many organized retailers worldwide has led to the easy availability of a variety of packaged food. 
Further, the report states that side effects of malic acid is affecting the market growth.
